Html: I need to update the content on a spreadsheet with has references and lookup to another source data excel file. Is this feature supported in PHPExcel?

Plain and simple answer, "No".... it may work, it may not, all depending on what you're doing with those references and lookups; but the PHPExcel calculation engine will not go loading up external files that may or may not exist, so it tests for the last calculated result for those formulae
